title: Week in Pictures: Royals in Africa, climate change, rocket launch
text:
ABC News photo editors chose the best news images of the week for this collection. </br></br>Prince Harry, Duke of Sussex, and Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, dance as they arrive for a visit to Justice Desk, an NGO in the township of Nyanga in Cape Town, South Africa, as they begin a tour of the region, Sept. 23, 2019. The 10-day trip began with an education workshop in Nyanga, a township crippled by gang violence and crime that sits on the outskirts of the city. Betram Malgas/AFP/Getty Images

Protesters take part in the Global Climate Strike as they march to parliament in Cape Town, South Africa, Sept. 20, 2019. Nic Bothma/EPA via Shutterstock

Breeder Benito Morena is reflected in a mirror as he walks by on his goat ranch in Putaendo, Chile, Sept. 23, 2019. From the region of Coquimbo in the north of Chile to Maule in the south, more than 30,000 livestock have died of hunger or thirst, and crops have been lost for lack of rain, according to the agriculture ministry. Esteban Felix/AP

The Russian Soyuz rocket is seen entering orbit from the International Space Station, Sept. 25, 2019, in a photo taken by NASA astronaut Christina Koch. Christina Koch/NASA via AP

Leader of the Brexit Party Nigel Farage prepares to go on stage and address party members and delegates at the Westpoint Centre, Sept. 22, 2019, in Exeter, England. The rally is part of a tour in which Farage will address audiences around the country. Christopher Furlong/Getty Images

A fireman tries to extinguish a fire near a house in Palangkaraya, Indonesia, Sept. 22, 2019. Firefighters, military personnel and water-dropping helicopters were deployed to douse fires in Sumatra and Borneo that caused thick a haze in the neighboring countries. Fully Handoko/EPA via Shutterstock

A child holds a newly hatched baby sea turtle born at a protective nesting site, part of the Israeli Sea Turtle Rescue Center's conservation program, at a beach near Mikhmoret north of Tel Aviv, Israel, Sept. 9, 2019. Amir Cohen/Reuters

Ryan Murphy, left, congratulates Billy Porter, winner of the outstanding lead actor in a drama series award for "Pose," at the 71st Primetime Emmy Awards, Sept. 22, 2019, in Los Angeles. Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP

A young boy holds a campaign placard as Pete Buttigieg, mayor of South Bend, Indiana, and a Democratic presidential hopeful, speaks at a campaign event in Dubuque, Iowa, Sept. 23, 2019. Elijah Nouvelage/Reuters

Christian Lealiifano of Australia is seen in action during a Rugby World Cup match between Australia and Fiji in Sapporo, Japan, Sept. 21, 2019. The Rugby World Cup is being held in Japan and will run until Nov. 2. Mark R Cristino/EPA via Shutterstock

This aerial view of central Bamako, Mali, Sept. 24, 2019, shows the site of car accident involving a fuel-tank truck that caught fire when people tried to lift it. Michele Cattani/AFP/Getty Images

A frog is sits on a leaf of a lotus plant in a pond after the rain in Lalitpur, Nepal, Sept. 26, 2019. Navesh Chitrakar/Reuters

Splendora Police Lt. Troy Teller, left, Cpl. Jacob Rutherford and Mike Jones pull a boat carrying Anita McFadden and Fred Stewart from their flooded neighborhood after rain from Tropical Depression Imelda, Sept. 19, 2019, in Spendora, Texas. Brett Coomer/Houston Chronicle via AP

An Indonesian police officer shouts during a clash with protesters outside the parliament building in Jakarta, Indonesia, Sept. 24, 2019. Thousands of students staged protests across the country against a new law that proposed changes in its criminal code and weakens the country's anti-corruption commission. Mast Irham/EPA via Shutterstock

Medics comfort a woman after a school collapsed in Nairobi, Kenya, Sept. 23, 2019. John Muchucha/AP

Ruling party Sen. Ralph Fethiere fires his gun outside Parliament as he arrives for a ceremony to ratify Fritz William Michel's nomination as prime minister in Port-au-Prince, Haiti, Sept. 23, 2019. Fethiere pulled a pistol when opposition protesters rushed at him and members of his entourage. Dieu Nalio Chery/AP
description: Find this week's top photos from around the globe in ABC News' This Week in Pictures slideshow
